source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as integer,
		{Code Postal fin} as integer,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string,
		{Plan prime} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> atcJoined
atcJoined select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC = {ID SAP},
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes} = {Plan prime},
		Matricule = {ID SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter3 derive({Canal final} = iif( in(["Vaillant diffus","SD diffus","Diffus"], {Plan primes}), "Diffus" ,"Chantier" ),
		toreplicate = {Code Postal fin}-{Code Postal début}+1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter({Code Postal début}<= {Code Postal fin}) ~> Filter2
Filter2 derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule = ATC,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 derive({Code postal} = {Code Postal début}+dd) ~> DerivedColumn4
Select1 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> Filter3
DerivedColumn4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_atc.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AtcprepareForReplicate
